betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The land of Runandor contains traces of Brightsteel, a strange metal, one that reminds or Arcanium, one of the secrets left by the Aesir.
One of the materials stowed in one of the buildings in Diamerisma also has properties that are similar.
This got me searching history of the Elves, a population that mysteriously seemes to have touched many of my allies and enemies.
They definitely had something to do with Asgard, and they were marginally involved with the struggle of the Testificates. They very much disliked the Twilight Horde, and opposed them whenever they tried to take over the home of the Aesir. 
As they fell with arcana, they too hid some of their secrets...
